content: linen stitch is the perfect way to show off a beautiful hand dyed yarn this linen stitch cowl is fun and easy worked in the round you ll love how quickly it comes together finished size as designed is 5 x 60 can easily modify for longer or shorter thicker or thinner yarn if you wish cast on an odd number color shown in pattern 862 piedras malabrigo arroyo view all yarn colors here 1 work on 24 or 32 circulars 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/malabrigo-arroyo-x28150524 htm
